title: [科技]Tekkit Lite 0.6.1——ForgeBukkit科技包[1.4.7]
author: sjjklh
txt_content:
Tekkit Lite为Tekkit的小服务器版，使用ForgeBukkit作为内核，可以认为是Bukkit的科技时代，可以说是相当可靠的懒人包。
我只是搬运了一下，个人是原版党，不会解决MOD问题……而且Tekkit为英文，无汉化。这点请大家权衡后使用。
下面均为官方介绍的翻译。用来下载Tekkit客户端的Technic Launcher：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-102780-1-1.html



http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNDU0MDYzODk2/v.swf

与你的朋友将Minecraft推向极致
改变世界，装点天空，潜入大海。使用技术与魔法，随心所欲地建造与破坏，依靠朋友的帮助，打击敌人。
Minecraft有史以来最伟大的MOD内容，都包含在这个简洁，易于运行，基于Bukkit的服务包里。

Tekkit使用Bukkit!
没错，Tekkit使用Bukkit作为内核，允许你将自己喜欢的插件安装在Tekkit中。十分感谢MC Port Centeral将大量的原版多人MOD移植到Bukkit平台上。


MOD列表：

Forge API by Lexmanos 
Balkons Weapon Mod by BalkondeurAlpha 
BuildCraft by SpaceToad/Krapht/SirSengir  
Buildcraft Additional Pipes
Buildcraft Logistic Pipes
CodeChickenCore by chicken_bones
ComputerCraft by dan200
Dimensional Anchors by immibis
Equivalent Exchange 3
EnderStorage by Ecu/chicken_bones
Factorization 
IC2 Advanced Machines by AtomicStryker
IC2 Advanced Power Management 
IC2 Advanced Repulsion Systems
IC2 Compact Solars by cpw
IC2 Nuclear Control by Shedar 
IC2 Transformers
Industrial Craft 2 by Alblaka & IC2 Team
Immibis Core by immibis 
Inventory Tweaks by Jimeowan
Iron Chests by cpw 
MineFactory Reloaded by Powercrystals
Mystcraft  
Not Enough Items by chicken_bones 
NEI RedPower Plugin
NEI Thermal Expansion Plugin 
Nether Ores by TehKrush
CoFH OmniTools by KingLemmingCoFH 
Railcraft by CovertJaguar
RedPower by Eloraam 
Rei's Minimap by ReiFNSK
Steve's Carts  
Thermal Expansion by KingLemmingCoFH 
Treecapitator 
Tube Stuff by immibis 
Wireless Redstone Chicken Bones Edition by chicken_bones
WRCBE Addons
WRCBE RedPower Addon
